item.title: Need this code explained! delta!

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Illadelph:

Any idea why there is no npc ==? like im very confused with this peice of code my server has -.-.

because this is the command that opens the wanneshop. Not the command that sets a WanneShop to the npc.

item.title: Need this code explained! delta!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

// IF the 'WannaShop' variable is greater than 0, continue. if (WanneShop > 0) { // IF the player is one tile away in distance of the skillX, skillY, absolute X, and absolute Y coordinates, continue. if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { // IF the previous checks were true, we will open up a shop with the value of the WanneShop variable. openUpShop(WanneShop); // Afterwards, we will reset the WanneShop variable back to 0. WanneShop = 0; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need this code explained! delta!
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

Trying to trade an npc on my server and long story short just not working out for me… so im trying to figure out exact for exact what this code means

if (WanneShop > 0) { if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 0; } }

Read full topic
